name: blunder-guessr
description: A Tampermonkey script for GeoGuessr that automatically collects weak rounds and adds them directly to your GeoGuessr map.

scripts.build: vite build && cat src/meta.js dist/blunder-guessr.user.js > dist/temp.js && mv dist/temp.js dist/blunder-guessr.user.js

author: 1nbuc
